SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli

Class DefaultLayout

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.DefaultLayout
public abstract class DefaultLayout extends Object
This class contains the values necessary to position graphic elements in the CLI as per the "default" layout.
